DOC.brief_title: Treatment Symptomatic Peripheral Neuropathy Patients With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients must type I type II Diabetes Mellitus . Have clinically diagnose positive sensory symptom numbness , lancinating pain , burn pain , ache pain , allodynia prickle sensation present great 5 year stable 6 month . Has HbA1C less equal 12 % . Patients HbA1C great 9 % must insulin therapy . Must 18 year old . Be able visit doctor 's office approximately 3 time maximum 6week period determine continue study . History significant liver problem . Have poor kidney function . Drink excess alcohol abuse drug . Have recently participate currently participate Medical study receive experimental drug . Are woman pregnant breastfeeding , intend become pregnant within next 2 year woman use effective birth control .
